channel.title: Some kind of hosting/portforward problem
channel.description:
Ok some one help me before i shoot my self please?
Ok i finally got my server up and running online. So I though. Me and my bother could both log in through no-ip. We are both on the same LAN. However other people can not get on... Just me and my brother. Is this some sort of problem like i have some unknown firewall enabled? If you have any idea please post it.

item.title: Some kind of hosting/portforward problem
item.dc:creator: @i_pk_pjers_i i_pk_pjers_i
item.description:
@i_pk_pjers_i wrote:

[quote=“Pilldom, post:3, topic:217253”]Yea but this really isnt tecinacly portforwaring its more of a problem connection, not completely portforwaring related.[/quote]yes, it is port forwarding related. 100% because thats why nobody else can connect to it so dont say its not about port forwarding when it is.

Read full topic
